nio/Logger.description: The _Logger_ block sends incoming signals to display in the terminal and System Designer's logger panel.

log_as_list.title: Log as a List
log_as_list.description: Hidden property to log incoming signals as lists. Default is `True` and signals are grouped inside their list. Setting this to `False` logs one signal at a time.

log_at.title: Log At
log_at.description: The log level that determines the rank of log messages to display. Default is INFO.

log_hidden_attributes.title: Log Hidden Attributes
log_hidden_attributes.description: If `True` (checked) the log output will include hidden (private) attributes denoted by a leading underscore (e.g., `_signal_attribute`.)

log.description: Force the logger block to log the configured phrase.
